title: Hailey Bieber is pictured leaving hair salon in Hollywood
text:
Hailey Bieber headed to the hair salon for an evening visit on Tuesday night and emerged with beautiful blonde curls.

The 22-year-old clearly made sure she was well-stocked for hair products as a trusty assistant carried two giant gift boxes to her car.

Hailey, who recently married pop star Justin Bieber for a second time, had been to The Nine Zero One salon in West Hollywood for her new look.

New look: Hailey Bieber was pictured leaving The Nine Zero One hair salon in Hollywood with beautiful curls (as a trusty assistant carries giant gift boxes to her car)

The website states it is a 'swanky hair boutique offering cuts & color amid modern decor, plus manicures & lash extensions.'

Hailey wore a low-key outfit for her outing, wearing a black camisole top with a pair of satin cargo trousers with a pair of Adidas trainers.

She carried a Louis Vuitton bumbag across her body.

Her outing comes after Justin used Instagram to put his five-bedroom Beverly Hills mansion on the market, with the furniture included.

Looking good: Hailey wore a low-key outfit for her outing, wearing a black camisole top with a pair of satin cargo trousers with a pair of Adidas trainers

Off to see Justin: She looked naturally beautiful as she made her way home in her car

Among the five people who have contacted him as potential buyers, one is what TMZ referred to as 'a billionaire from a very famous family.'

Hailey, who has been sporting a $500,000 new Tiffany engagement ring, had a courthouse wedding with Justin in New York last September.

However, the pair of devoted Christians were set on an ecclesiastical wedding too and held a ceremony at the Montage Palmetto Bluff's Somerset Chapel last month.

Their 150-strong guest list included a string of celebrities such as Kylie and Kendall Jenner, Usher and Jaden Smith - as well as various Baldwins.

By way of her father Stephen, Hailey is a member of the famous Baldwin acting family, whose best-known member is her uncle Alec.

Three days after the South Carolina wedding, Justin released a romantic new single with Dan + Shay called 10,000 Hours - a number he tweeted was 'Wedding music.'

A day after the song dropped, Justin and Hailey co-starred in both the 10,000 music video and an underwear campaign with Calvin Klein.

Shortly after his last breakup from his on-off flame Selena Gomez last year, Justin and Hailey had whirlwind romance and he proposed that summer in the Bahamas.
description: Hailey Bieber headed to the hair salon for an evening visit on Tuesday night and emerged with beautiful blonde curls.
